Package com.mlt.desktop

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EditField
    Interface that should implement controls to edit fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alert
    An alert dialog that supports the standard PLAIN, INFORMATION, WARNING, CONFIRMATION and ERROR configurations, with some predefined buttons.
    AWT
    AWT and Swing utilities.
    AWT.AcceleratorKeyListener
    A key listener to manage accelerator keys.
    EditContext
    A context that contains the necessary items to edit a field.
    FileChooser
    File chooser extension.
    LookupRecords
    Lookup records from a recordset or a list of records in a modal dialog.
    Option
    Packs the attributes of an button or menu item option, like the optional action, the text, the tooltip, etc.
    Option.Group
    Option groups are used to group options.
    OptionWindow
    A frame or dialog that has the following properties.
    TaskFrame
    A frame to monitor and manage a list of tasks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Alert.Type
    Enumerate alert types.
    EditMode
    Enumerates the different edit modes.
